entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:07 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
